as.description: The element or component the TabPanel should render as.
as.description_zh: TabPanel 应呈现为的元素或组件。

static.description: Whether the element should ignore the selected index._Note: static and unmount can not be used at the same time.
static.description_zh: 元素是否应忽略所选index._Note：static 和 unmount 不能同时使用。

unmount.description:
Whether the element should be unmounted or hidden based on the selected
index._Note: static and unmount can not be used at the same time.
unmount.description_zh:
元素是应该卸载还是隐藏基于所选
index._Note：static 和 unmount 不能同时使用。

slots.name: selected
slots.description: Whether or not the TabPanel is currently selected.
